躥.definition: to leap up; (coll.) to gush out; to spurt out

躥升.definition: to rise rapidly; to shoot up

躥房越脊.definition: lit. to leap the house and cross the roofridge (idiom); dashing over rooftops (of robbers and pursuing knight-errant 俠客|侠客 in fiction)

躥貨.definition: product in great demand; hot property

躥跳.definition: to bound forward; to bound along
